name: Brave Boy (Leonid)
description:
I am developing this game specifically for Game Jam - Game Boy Showdown.

You have to play as a man who dared to go on a journey through time. 

This is a game this is my first project on Game Boy, I created my game on the GB Studio game engine.

To create the game, I used such assets as: 

>https://petermilko.itch.io/pixel-petes-art-assets

>https://elvies.itch.io/gb-studio-assets

>https://tiptoptomcat.itch.io/8-bit-gameboy-songs-gb-studio

>https://chasersgaming.itch.io/platformer-assets-tile-set-sandlands-gb

>https://parabellum-games.itch.io/gb-studio-character-pack
